mapper.insert: insert into dm values( dm_seq.nextval, #{senderNo}, #{receiverNo}, #{dmContent}, sysdate, 0, #{senderId}, #{senderName}, 0 )
mapper.select: select dm_no as dmNo, sender as senderNo, receiver as receiverNo, member_nickname as senderName, dm_content as dmContent, to_char(dm_date,'yy-mm-dd') as dmDate, member_id as receiverId, read_check as readCheck from dm where receiver = #{receiverNo} order by 1 desc

select dm_no as dmNo, sender as senderNo, receiver as receiverNo, member_nickname as senderName, dm_content as dmContent, to_char(dm_date,'yy-mm-dd') as dmDate, member_id as receiverId, read_check as readCheck from dm
where receiver = #{receiverNo} and dm_content like '%'||#{senderName}||'%' order by 1 desc
where receiver = #{receiverNo} and member_nickname like '%'||#{senderName}||'%' order by 1 desc
